Description: All Annual Meeting attendees are invited to participate in this special evening session hosted by the AACR Population Sciences (PSWG) Working Group in cluding the current Chair of PSWG  Dr.Lorelei Mucci and Past Chair Dr. Andrew T. Chan.The 2023 PSWG Town Hall will be dedicated to the memory of Leslie Bernstein and Gloria M. Peterson and will feature a panel discussion centered around the topic of Linking Epidemiology and Implementation Sciences. The Town Hall also includes a Networking Reception at the beginning and conclusion of the session.
SearchResultBody: TM06. Linking Epidemiology and Implementation Science: A Population Sciences Working Group Town Hall Meeting and Networking Reception
Title: Linking Epidemiology and Implementation Science: A Population Sciences Working Group Town Hall Meeting and Networking Reception
